General.Name: Shinyoung HappyTomorrow SPAC 2
General.Description: Fashion Platform Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells women's clothing and accessories in South Korea. The company was formerly known as Kochi International Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Fashion Platform Co.,Ltd. in November 2016. Fashion Platform Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
